mapper.insert:
select seq_db_tag_list.nextval from dual
insert into db_tag_list (id, pic, name, url, pub, star, desc, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{star,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update db_tag_list set pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pub = #{pub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, star = #{star,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, pic, `name`, url, pub, star, `desc`, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at from db_tag_list where star>=9.0

update.foreach:
update db_tag_list
pic=#{item.pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name=#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url=#{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pub=#{item.pub,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
star=#{item.star,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
desc=#{item.desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at=#{item.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at=#{item.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted_at=#{item.deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR}
